1629580.name: Build Molecules For Vick Soundtrack
1629580.description:
Soundtrack with instrumental music created especially for the game Vick Scientist: Atoms Swap.

Now you can enjoy the themes created by the talented musician Tatyana Jacques on your computer at any time.

Perfect for studying, working or just relaxing. Each track can be repeated continuously. Listen directly from your Steam client.

- Includes an original soundtrack for the game Vick Scientist: Atoms Swap.

The soundtrack can be purchased independently of the games and will also be offered in a special package with the game.
